metadata.name: PUA - DIT Snapshot Viewer
metadata.comment: Detects the use of Ditsnap tool, an inspection tool for Active Directory database, ntds.dit.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\ditsnap.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ditsnap.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the use of Ditsnap tool, an inspection tool for Active Directory database, ntds.dit.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate admin usage References: https://thedfirreport.com/2020/06/21/snatch-ransomware/, https://web.archive.org/web/20201124182207/https://github.com/yosqueoy/ditsnap
